Instruction: Season the chicken breast with salt and black pepper.
Heat olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat.
Cook the chicken breast in the skillet until cooked through, about 6-8 minutes per side.
Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing.
In a bowl, mash the avocado with lemon juice until smooth.
Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Layer lettuce, tomato, sliced chicken breast, and mashed avocado on one slice of bread.
Top with the other slice of bread.
Cut the sandwich in half if desired and serve.
